target_text: Energian tuotannossa tai käytössä syntyvä lämpö, jota ei hyödynnetä, tai teollisuusprosessin sivutuotteena väistämättä syntyvä lämpö, jota ei hyödynnetä.

source_text: energy source which, from the perspective of energy use by humans, offers a finite amount of energy and whose reserve decreases in use.
modified_source_text: energy source which, from the perspective of energy use by humans, offers a finite amount of energy and whose reserve decreases in use.
target_text: Energialähde, joka ihmisten energiankäytön näkökulmasta tarjoaa rajallisen määrän energiaa ja jonka varasto pienenee käytössä.

source_text: plan applying to an individual repair project of those repair measures that will eliminate a defect, damage or deficiency.
modified_source_text: plan applying to an individual repair project of those repair measures that will eliminate a defect, damage or deficiency.
target_text: Suunnitelma koskee yksittäisen hanke/projektin korjaustoimenpiteitä, joiden tarkoituksena on poistaa virhe, vaurio tai puute.

source_text: complex that is based on a coherent plan and that consists of a large area and principally several building objects.
modified_source_text: complex that is based on a coherent plan and that consists of a large area and principally several building objects.
target_text: Alue, joka perustuu johdonmukaiseen suunnitelmaan ja koostuu suuresta alueesta sekä pääasiassa useista rakennuksista.

source_text: device that absorbs solar radiation energy of the sun into thermal energy.
modified_source_text: device that absorbs solar radiation energy of the sun into thermal energy.
target_text: Laite, joka absorboi auringon säteilyenergian lämpöenergiaksi.

source_text: unwanted transfer of thermal energy from a source, transfer system or point of use.
modified_source_text: unwanted transfer of thermal energy from a source, transfer system or point of use.
target_text: Lämpöenergian ei-toivottu siirtyminen lähteestä, siirtovälineestä tai käyttökohdasta.

source_text: distribution of thermal energy in the form of steam or hot liquid via a network to several locations separate from one another.
modified_source_text: distribution of thermal energy in the form of steam or hot liquid via a network to several locations separate from one another.
target_text: Lämpöenergian jakelu höyryn tai kuuman nesteen muodossa verkoston kautta useisiin toisistaan erillisiin sijainteihin.

source_text: device or coating that converts solar radiation energy into electrical energy by means of the photoelectric effect.
modified_source_text: device or coating that converts solar radiation energy into electrical energy by means of the photoelectric effect.
target_text: Laite tai pinnoite, joka muuntaa auringonsäteilyn energiaa sähköenergiaksi valosähköisen ilmiön avulla.

source_text: building for social services that is mainly in use during the day and that does not usually have beds for overnight stays.
modified_source_text: building for social services that is mainly in use during the day and that does not usually have beds for overnight stays.
target_text: Sosiaalipalvelurakennus, jota käytetään pääasiassa päiväsaikaan eikä yleensä ole suunniteltu yöpymiseen.

source_text: area surrounding a major-accident hazard site, for which a statement must be requested from the Finnish Safety and Chemicals Agency (TUKES) and the rescue authority in connection with drawing up a land use plan or the building permit procedure when planning activities for the site.
modified_source_text: area surrounding a major-accident hazard site, for which a statement must be requested from the Finnish Safety and Chemicals Agency (TUKES) and the rescue authority in connection with drawing up a land use plan or the building permit procedure when planning activities for the site.
target_text: Suunnittelualue, joka sijaitsee merkittävän onnettomuusriskin alueen ympärillä, jolta on haettava kannanotto Suomen Turvallisuus- ja kemikaalivirastolta (TUKES) sekä pelastusviranomaiselta alueidenkäyttösuunnitelmaa laadittaessa tai rakennuslupa/rakentamislupa -menettelyn yhteydessä, kun suunnitellaan toimintaa kyseiselle alueelle.

source_text: connection formed mainly of unbuilt land and water areas that allows organisms to move and spread from one habitat to another.
modified_source_text: connection formed mainly of unbuilt land and water areas that allows organisms to move and spread from one habitat to another.

source_text: functional centre of a municipality or its subdivision, where public and commercial services, housing and jobs are located in a varied and more dense way than in the surrounding area.
modified_source_text: functional centre of a municipality or its subdivision, where public and commercial services, housing and jobs are located in a varied and more dense way than in the surrounding area.
target_text: Kunnan tai sen alueen toiminnallinen keskus, jossa julkiset ja kaupalliset palvelut, asuminen ja työpaikat sijaitsevat vaihtelevammin ja tiiviimmin kuin ympäröivällä alueella.

source_text: area located outside a local detailed plan area where spatial planning may be necessary to safeguard the targeted community development of the area or because of special environmental values or significant environmental impacts, and where special conditions for granting a building permit therefore apply.
modified_source_text: area located outside a local detailed plan area where spatial planning may be necessary to safeguard the targeted community development of the area or because of special environmental values or significant environmental impacts, and where special conditions for granting a building permit therefore apply.
target_text: Alue, joka sijaitsee asemakaava-alueen ulkopuolella, jossa suunnittelu saattaa olla tarpeen alueen tavoitellun yhteisön kehityksen turvaamiseksi tai erityisten ympäristöarvojen tai merkittävien ympäristövaikutusten vuoksi, ja jossa rakennuslupaa myöntämiseen sovelletaan erityisiä ehtoja.

source_text: area consisting of one or more urbanised densely built-up areas and the area surrounding them that are connected to one another by the built environment or by functional interaction.
modified_source_text: area consisting of one or more urbanised densely built-up areas and the area surrounding them that are connected to one another by the built environment or by functional interaction.
target_text: Alue, joka koostuu yhdestä tai useammasta kaupungistuneesta, tiiviisti rakennetusta alueesta ja niitä ympäröivästä alueesta, jotka ovat yhteydessä toisiinsa rakennetun ympäristön tai toiminnallisen vuorovaikutuksen kautta.

source_text: structure of the whole country, region or part thereof that includes the location and interrelationship of communities of different sizes and external functions, as well as of traffic routes and technical services networks connecting them.
modified_source_text: structure of the whole country, region or part thereof that includes the location and interrelationship of communities of different sizes and external functions, as well as of traffic routes and technical services networks connecting them.

source_text: area partially or fully covered by vegetation that is not a private courtyard.
modified_source_text: area partially or fully covered by vegetation that is not a private courtyard.
target_text: Kasvillisuudella osittain tai kokonaan peitetty alue, joka ei ole yksityinen sisäpiha.

source_text: structure of a commuter area, urban region, municipality, part of a municipality or other densely built-up area that includes the location and interrelationship of different functions and the traffic routes and technical servicing networks connecting them.
modified_source_text: structure of a commuter area, urban region, municipality, part of a municipality or other densely built-up area that includes the location and interrelationship of different functions and the traffic routes and technical servicing networks connecting them.
target_text: Tyypillinen rakennelma kaupunkiseudulla, kunnassa, kunnan osassa tai muulla tiiviisti rakennetulla alueella, joka sisältää sijainnin ja eri toimintojen välisen yhteyden, sekä niitä yhdistävät liikenne- ja tekniset palveluverkot.

source_text: area adjacent to the shoreline where buildings located on this area would have direct impacts on the water bodies, the coastal environment and the landscape.
modified_source_text: area adjacent to the shoreline where buildings located on this area would have direct impacts on the water bodies, the coastal environment and the landscape.

modified_source_text: plan of a construction project and the implementation of its developer supervision presented by a party engaging in a construction project.

modified_source_text: action plan that specifies the repair programme in more detail and proceeds each year.

source_text: structure intended for use by the public for general spending time or hobbies.
modified_source_text: structure intended for use by the public for general spending time or hobbies.

source_text: report that justifies the need for the acquisition of a space or the modification of an existing space, provides a preliminary description of the spaces needed and the requirements set for these spaces, examines alternative uses and assesses the cost-effectiveness of various solutions.
modified_source_text: report that justifies the need for the acquisition of a space or the modification of an existing space, provides a preliminary description of the spaces needed and the requirements set for these spaces, examines alternative uses and assesses the cost-effectiveness of various solutions.

modified_source_text: healthcare building for primary healthcare.

modified_source_text: features of a building that have been shaped by the construction methods, stylistic period and building provisions at the time of its construction or repair, as well as the building’s individual features.
